attachments.title: iWatch Thoughts
attachments.text: TweetBe Sociable, Share! Tweet Related columns: More iWatch Fun Tweet  When looking at the potential for a really smart watch, the idea of an Apple iWatch looks almost sensible. Still, there is a long way between the attractive idea and stuffing the required computer power in a wristwatch. As I somberly contemplate the death of(...)

text: speaking of watches - more interesting thinking on the potential (or lack there of) of an iWatch

attachments.title: Pebble Smartwatch Gets Misfit App for Pedometer Step-Counts
attachments.text: Pebble continues to update its e-paper smartwatch, despite the approaching threat of Android Wear. Today the firm announced a new partnership with Misfit, the company behind the Shine fitness tracker, giving... Keep reading →
